text.autoconfig.chat_heads.title: Chat Heads
text.autoconfig.chat_heads.option.offset: All text will be aligned if enabled
text.autoconfig.chat_heads.option.smartH: Some servers don't tell (the UUID of) who sent a message,
so we make a guess based on the content. This can lead to
non-player messages getting a chat head.
This option disables this guessing if the server sent
text.chat_heads.config.error.title: Couldn't open config menu
text.chat_heads.config.error.cloth_confi: Open Cloth Config page on CurseForge
